text:
e="preserve">Vincent Mhlanga is a Swazi politician. He was the acting Prime Minister of Swaziland from September 7, 2018 to October 27, 2018. He was a managing director at the King’s Office.
On September 4, 2018, Prime Minister Barnabas Dlamini resigned, Mhlanga was named Acting Prime Minister and began his duties on September 7. He left office on October 27, 2018 when Ambrose Mandvulo Dlamini took office.
